page.title: 19 Population Studies 1
page.content:
In 1961 the population of Tamworth was approx. 30,000. In 1981 it had expanded to 64,253. We wanted to find out where all the people had come from. We sent 200 questionnaires to five schools an recieved the following answers. QUESTIONNAIRE % Have you moved in the last year? 15 5 years? 29 between 5-20 years ago? 78 more than 20 years ago? 2 Previous place of residence Birmingham 45 Reasons for moving Getting married 11 Change in family size 45 Change in job 15 Change in income 19
Most families arrived in Tamworth in the last 5 to 20 years.
